definition: to betray/to desert/to defect from/to turn renegade
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Often it rebels against the accepted values of society.
sentences.chinese: 它常常叛離社會所接受的價值標準。
